ygData.msgSnippet: ... That reminds me.  Another thing I would change is the AI so that if you attack a named social mob, it would aggro nearby mobs regardless of whether or not
ygData.messageBody:
> People would be running all over and yelling "Hey I see WaxOnius, has
> anyone seen WaxOffius?"

That reminds me. Another thing I would change is the AI so
that if you attack a named social mob, it would aggro nearby
mobs regardless of whether or not they're "afraid of" (green
to) you. Likewise if you attack a green mob near a named mob,
the named mob would aggro, causing all other nearby mobs to
aggro. Currently, it's too easy for a high level player to
run through a low level dungeon, find the named mobs (easy
with tracking), and kill just them with little risk to
himself.

--
John H. Kim
